# Government Tender Announcement
**Reference Number:** cb-491-29757166
**Solicitation Number:** 5P468-23-0161/A
**Publication Date:** 2024-02-15
**Tender Closing Date:** 2024-04-04T140000

## Brief Description
Parks Canada Agency (PCA) invites consulting firms with Environmental Engineering expertise to submit offers for Standing Offers. Firms selected will provide professional and technical services for various types of environmental services on an "as-and-when-requested" basis in National Parks, excluding locations within Comprehensive Land Claim Agreements (CLCAs) and services identified in the Required Services section of this document.

**Required Services:**

We anticipate and require various types of environmental services related to federally controlled sites, including contaminated sites in remote communities and Canada's National Parks and Historic Sites. This call is for multidisciplinary Environmental Engineering Services.

## Classification
The listed services are classified under the following UNSPSC categories:

* Environmental Impact Assessment EIA services
* Environmental monitoring
* Environmental advisory services
* Environmental sciences advisory services

## Region of Opportunity and Delivery
This call is open to Canadian firms and services will be delivered in Canada.

## Penalties for Non-Compliance
The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement. All work must be performed in accordance with the ordinances, laws, rules, and regulations set out in the National Park Act.

## Tendering Procedures

Mandatory Documentation:
Consulting firms must obtain documents from the Government Electronic Tendering Service through the Government of Canada tendering service at [www.canadabuys.canada.ca](http://www.canadabuys.canada.ca). Late submissions will not be considered.

Acceptable Formats:
 Documents may be submitted in either English or French.

Faxed or email bids will be accepted as official. Please refer to the solicitation document for email and fax contact information.

Evaluation Criteria
Proposals will be evaluated based on the following criteria:

* Technical merit
* Price
